meaning list.sentence translation: D’fhoghlaim sé intricacies na gairme óna mheantóir.

meaning list.meaning: Fíorcharachtar nó rúin duine éigin a thaispeáint (gnáthscéal)
meaning list.sentence: She showed her true colours when she refused to help.
meaning list.sentence translation: Thaispeáin sé a dhathanna dílse nuair a dhiúltaigh sé cuidiú.

word: turn back the hands of time
phonetic american: tɜːrn bæk ðə hændz əv taɪm
phonetic british: tɜːn bæk ðə hændz əv taɪm

meaning list.meaning: Chun filleadh ar an am atá thart nó am a chasadh ar ais (gnáthscéal)
meaning list.sentence: If I could turn back the hands of time, I’d make a different decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dá bhféadfainn am a iompú ar ais, bheadh cinneadh difriúil déanta agam.

meaning list.meaning: Ceachtanna foghlamtha ón saol
meaning list.sentence: He never went to college but learned everything from the university of life.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ní dheachaigh sé go dtí an ollscoil, ach d’fhoghlaim sé gach rud ón saol.

meaning list.meaning: Rud nach dtarlóidh choíche (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: You can wait until hell freezes over, but I won’t change my mind.
meaning list.sentence translation: Is féidir leat fanacht go deo ach ní athróidh mé m'intinn.

meaning list.meaning: rud éigin ag dul amú nó ag teip (giomnáisiam)
meaning list.sentence: All our hard work went up in smoke when the project was canceled.
meaning list.sentence translation: Chuaigh ár n-obair chrua ar fad síos an draein nuair a cuireadh an tionscadal ar ceal.

meaning list.meaning: ag fanacht le deis, á ullmhú (gnáth cainte)
meaning list.sentence: She’s waiting in the wings for a chance to prove herself.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tá sé ag fanacht le deis a chruthú dó féin.

meaning list.meaning: duine éigin a thréigean nó díomá a chur air
meaning list.sentence: He walked out on his family when things got tough.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nuair a d’éirigh cúrsaí dian, thréig sé a chlann.

meaning list.meaning: cur amú ama (giomnáisiam)
meaning list.sentence: We’re wasting time discussing irrelevant issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: Caithimid am ag plé topaicí nach mbaineann le hábhar.

meaning list.meaning: Córas nó grúpa a ritheann go réidh (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: The team works like a well-oiled machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: Oibríonn an fhoireann cosúil le córas a ritheann go réidh.

meaning list.meaning: Bíodh am iontach agat
meaning list.sentence: We had a whale of a time at the amusement park.
meaning list.sentence translation: Bhí am iontach againn sa pháirc siamsa.

meaning list.meaning: Chun a bheith an-bhán ó eagla nó tinneas (gnáth cainte)
meaning list.sentence: He turned white as a sheet when he heard the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: D'iompaigh sé pale nuair a chuala sé an nuacht.

meaning list.meaning: oibrí oifige, duine a dhéanann obair mheabhrach (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: White-collar jobs are becoming more common in urban areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tá poist bhóna bháin ag éirí níos coitianta i gceantair uirbeacha.

meaning list.meaning: Rud a chosnaíonn an iomarca ach atá gan úsáid
meaning list.sentence: The stadium turned out to be a white elephant for the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: Iompaigh an staidiam amach a bheith ina infheistíocht costasach ach useless don chathair.

meaning list.meaning: Bréag neamhdhíobhálach nó dea-intinn (gnáthscéal)
meaning list.sentence: She told a white lie to avoid hurting his feelings.
meaning list.sentence translation: Dúirt sé bréag beag a sheachaint Gortaítear a mothúcháin.

meaning list.meaning: botún nó locht a chlúdach
meaning list.sentence: The company tried to whitewash the scandal.
meaning list.sentence translation: Rinne an chuideachta iarracht an scannal a chlúdach.

meaning list.meaning: go léir, gach rud (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: When they throw a party, they go the whole nine yards with decorations and food.
meaning list.sentence translation: Nuair a chaitheann siad cóisir, téann siad go léir amach le maisiúcháin agus bia.

meaning list.meaning: Le spleodar agus díograis mhór (giomnáisiam)
meaning list.sentence: I’ll be at your party with bells on!
meaning list.sentence translation: Tiocfaidh mé chuig do chóisir le sceitimíní iontach!

meaning list.meaning: Duais nó teideal tugtha don té a thagann go deireanach (gnáthscéal)
meaning list.sentence: They were awarded the wooden spoon for finishing last in the league.
meaning list.sentence translation: Fuair siad an duais spúnóg adhmaid as a bheith go deireanach sa léig.

meaning list.meaning: ag obair go foirfe (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: This new cleaning product works like a charm.
meaning list.sentence translation: Oibríonn an táirge glantacháin nua seo go foirfe.

meaning list.meaning: Ní dhéanfainn nó ní bheinn i gcúinsí (idiom) choíche
meaning list.sentence: I wouldn’t be caught dead wearing that outfit.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ní chaithfinn an chulaith sin choíche.

meaning list.meaning: Arís agus arís eile, bliain i ndiaidh bliana, ar feadh na mblianta (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: They visit the same beach year in, year out.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tugann siad cuairt ar an trá chéanna gach bliain.

meaning list.meaning: cowardly, misniúil (gníomhaíocht)
meaning list.sentence: He’s too yellow-bellied to confront his boss.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tá sé i bhfad ró-an bólaí chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar a bhainisteoir.

word: you can't teach an old dog new tricks
phonetic american: juː kænt tiːʧ ən oʊld dɔːɡ nuː trɪks
phonetic british: juː kɑːnt tiːʧ ən əʊld dɒɡ njuː trɪks

meaning list.meaning: Tá sé deacair duine a bhfuil sean-nósanna aige a athrú (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He refuses to learn how to use a smartphone; you can’t teach an old dog new tricks.
meaning list.sentence translation: Diúltaíonn sé foghlaim conas fón cliste a úsáid; Tá sé deacair sean-nósanna a athrú.

word: your guess is as good as mine
phonetic american: jʊr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn
phonetic british: jɔːr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn

meaning list.meaning: Níl a fhios agam ach an oiread, seans go bhfuil an dá bhuille faoi thuairim againn chomh cruinn céanna
meaning list.sentence: Why the train is late? Your guess is as good as mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: Cén fáth go raibh an traein déanach? Níl a fhios agam ach an oiread.
